statement.p: A rocket launch occurs at \displaystyle{t}={0} seconds. Its height, in meters above sea-level, as a function of time is given by \displaystyle{h}=-{4.9}{t}^{{2}}+{253}{t}+{353}.
Assuming that the rocket will splash down into the ocean, at what time does splashdown occur? seconds.
At what time will the rocket become level with the take-off location? seconds
